prompts: Create a small bird-like Pokemon with a fluffy tail and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a tiny sparrow, featuring gray feathers and a bright orange beak.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the forest with a playful demeanor and winged features.
Generate a cute, chubby Pokemon with a round body and striking black and white patterns.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, resembling a little bird with a curious personality.
Make a flying-type Pokemon with a compact shape and cheerful colors, perfect for a sunny day.
Give me an adorable Pokemon that loves to sing and has a charming personality.
